mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile navigation by optimizing button sizes and touch targets for better usability on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider compressing large images and optimizing JavaScript files to reduce load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve on-page SEO by adding more detailed meta descriptions, keywords, and image alt text.
userExperienceTip: Enhance content clarity by reducing unnecessary pop-ups or distractions during browsing.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking form by reducing the number of fields or providing autocomplete suggestions.
tips: Ensure the site is fully accessible by improving screen reader compatibility.
